name: YouTube Awesome Customizable Progressbar
description: New page load bar on top.

style_setting_options.label: Freaky Yellow (May slow)
style_setting_options.value:
background: -moz-linear-gradient(-45deg, #fceabb 0%, #fccd4d 50%, #f8b500 51%, #fbdf93 100%)!important; /* FF3.6+ */
background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right bottom, color-stop(0%,#fceabb), color-stop(50%,#fccd4d), color-stop(51%,#f8b500), color-stop(100%,#fbdf93))!important; /* Chrome,Safari4+ */
background: -webkit-linear-gradient(-45deg, #fceabb 0%,#fccd4d 50%,#f8b500 51%,#fbdf93 100%)!important; /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */
background: -o-linear-gradient(-45deg, #fceabb 0%,#fccd4d 50%,#f8b500 51%,#fbdf93 100%)!important; /* Opera 11.10+ */
background: -ms-linear-gradient(-45deg, #fceabb 0%,#fccd4d 50%,#f8b500 51%,#fbdf93 100%)!important; /* IE10+ */
background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fceabb 0%,#fccd4d 50%,#f8b500 51%,#fbdf93 100%)!important; /* W3C */

style_setting_options.label: Freaky Purple (May slow)
style_setting_options.value:
background: -moz-linear-gradient(-45deg, #cb60b3 0%, #c146a1 50%, #a80077 51%, #db36a4 100%)!important; /* FF3.6+ */
background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right bottom, color-stop(0%,#cb60b3), color-stop(50%,#c146a1), color-stop(51%,#a80077), color-stop(100%,#db36a4))!important; /* Chrome,Safari4+ */
background: -webkit-linear-gradient(-45deg, #cb60b3 0%,#c146a1 50%,#a80077 51%,#db36a4 100%)!important; /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */
background: -o-linear-gradient(-45deg, #cb60b3 0%,#c146a1 50%,#a80077 51%,#db36a4 100%)!important; /* Opera 11.10+ */
background: -ms-linear-gradient(-45deg, #cb60b3 0%,#c146a1 50%,#a80077 51%,#db36a4 100%)!important; /* IE10+ */
background: linear-gradient(135deg, #cb60b3 0%,#c146a1 50%,#a80077 51%,#db36a4 100%)!important; /* W3C */

style_setting_options.label: Freaky Blue (May slow)
style_setting_options.value:
background: -moz-linear-gradient(45deg, #cedbe9 0%, #aac5de 17%, #6199c7 50%, #3a84c3 51%, #419ad6 59%, #4bb8f0 71%, #3a8bc2 84%, #26558b 100%)!important; /* FF3.6+ */
background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left bottom, right top, color-stop(0%,#cedbe9), color-stop(17%,#aac5de), color-stop(50%,#6199c7), color-stop(51%,#3a84c3), color-stop(59%,#419ad6), color-stop(71%,#4bb8f0), color-stop(84%,#3a8bc2), color-stop(100%,#26558b))!important; /* Chrome,Safari4+ */
background: -webkit-linear-gradient(45deg, #cedbe9 0%,#aac5de 17%,#6199c7 50%,#3a84c3 51%,#419ad6 59%,#4bb8f0 71%,#3a8bc2 84%,#26558b 100%)!important; /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */
background: -o-linear-gradient(45deg, #cedbe9 0%,#aac5de 17%,#6199c7 50%,#3a84c3 51%,#419ad6 59%,#4bb8f0 71%,#3a8bc2 84%,#26558b 100%)!important; /* Opera 11.10+ */
background: -ms-linear-gradient(45deg, #cedbe9 0%,#aac5de 17%,#6199c7 50%,#3a84c3 51%,#419ad6 59%,#4bb8f0 71%,#3a8bc2 84%,#26558b 100%)!important; /* IE10+ */
background: linear-gradient(45deg, #cedbe9 0%,#aac5de 17%,#6199c7 50%,#3a84c3 51%,#419ad6 59%,#4bb8f0 71%,#3a8bc2 84%,#26558b 100%)!important; /* W3C */

style_setting_options.label: 3D
